item.title: Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy
item.description: The budget carrier is trying to recover from the pandemic-caused swoon in travel and failed mergers.

item.title: 14 suspects linked to powerful cartel arrested in Spain murder probe
item.description: The arrests came after a murder victim's family received a large ransom request and $32,000 was paid in cryptocurrency.
